nodes.text: Judging from the plaque, this is the Faculty Lounge, where some of the world's finest academic minds meet to share the latest techniques and secrets to making our lives miserable.
No answer... I don't think anyone is in there right now.
It's probably a bad idea to disturb teachers in their den - they might bite.
The door to this room is locked. No surprise there.
This really is a bad time for this... I don't want a teacher to catch me trying to pick the lock! Better wait for later when I know they won't be around.
This is a tricky lock! I'd have to practice more to handle this one.

options.text: Unlock the Door with the Key

nodes.text: This really is a bad time for this... I don't want a teacher to catch me with a key. Better wait for later when I know they won't be around.
The Faculty Key worked - it's unlocked.
I don't dare try to listen at this door right now. Some teacher - or worse - might catch me at it...
I don't hear anyone in there right now.
I can barely make out that someone is talking... but I can't make out the words. Guess I need to sharpen my eavesdropping skills a little before I can hear anything through this thick door.
